summary: Injured on the job Vasily Kuzyakin gets a ticket to the resort. There he meets femme fatale Raisa Zakharovna, and once under the charm, moves to live with her. Unfortunately, a new life is not all that sweet as dreamed hapless Vasily.
cast: Aleksandr Mikhaylov|Nina Doroshina|Lyudmila Gurchenko|Sergey Yurskiy|Natalya Tenyakova|Yanina Lisovskaya|Igor Lyakh|Lada Sizonenko|Vladimir Menshov
title: Lyubov i golubi
